45 namespace Mutation {

47 
53 class LangevinColInt : public CollisionIntegral
54 {
55 public:
56 
57  LangevinColInt(CollisionIntegral::ARGS args) :
58  CollisionIntegral(args), m_fac(0.0), m_alpha(0.0)
59  {
60  // Make sure this is an ion-neutral interaction
61  args.xml.parseCheck(args.pair.type() == ION_NEUTRAL,
62  "must be ion-neutral interaction to use the Langevin integral.");
63 
64  // Determine the charge of the ion and the name of the neutral
65  double z = args.pair.sp1().charge();
66  string neutral = args.pair.sp2Name();
67 
68  if (z == 0.0) {
69  z = args.pair.sp2().charge();
70  neutral = args.pair.sp1Name();
71  }
72 
73  // Determine (l,s)
74  string kind = args.kind;
75  bool format_check = (
76  kind.size() == 3 && kind[0] == 'Q' &&
77  kind[1] > '0' && kind[1] < '4' &&
78  kind[2] > '0' && kind[2] < '6');
79  args.xml.parseCheck(format_check,
80  "integral must be 'Qls' with 0 < l < 4 and 0 < s < 6.");
81  int l = int(kind[1])-48;
82  int s = int(kind[2])-48;
83 
84  // Load the dipole polarizability of the neutral in m^3
85  m_alpha = loadSpeciesParameter(
86  args.xml.document()->root(), "dipole-polarizabilities", neutral);
87 
88  // Compute the factor that is multiplied by sqrt(alpha/T)
89  const double sfac [5] = {0.66467, 0.55389, 0.48466, 0.43619, 0.39984};
90  const double lfac [3] = {1.1046, 1.1538, 1.2754};
91  m_fac = PI*lfac[l-1]*sfac[s-1]*std::sqrt(z*z*QE*QE/(TWOPI*EPS0*KB));
92  }
93 
94  // Allow tabulation of this integral type
95  bool canTabulate() const { return true; }
96 
97  // Make sure we could correctly load the data
98  bool loaded() const { return m_alpha * m_fac > 0.0; }
99 
100 private:
101 
102  double compute_(double T) { return m_fac * std::sqrt(m_alpha / T); }
103 
107  bool isEqual(const CollisionIntegral& ci) const {
108  const LangevinColInt& compare = dynamic_cast<const LangevinColInt&>(ci);
109  return (m_fac == compare.m_fac && m_alpha == compare.m_alpha);
110  }
111 
112 private:
113  double m_fac;
114  double m_alpha;
115 };
116 
117 // Register the "Langevin" CollisionIntegral
118 ObjectProvider<LangevinColInt, CollisionIntegral> Langevin_ci("Langevin");
119 
120  } // Mutation
121 } // Transport
